meanings.definition: Very small or tiny in size.
meanings.sent1: The microminiature toy car fit in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent2: The microminiature flowers in the garden were hard to spot.
meanings.sent3: I found a microminiature pencil that was too small to write with!
meanings.sent4: Her microminiature earrings were like sparkling specks of dust.
meanings.sent5: The microminiature ants scurried across the picnic blanket unnoticed.

meanings.definition: A work of art or technology that is extremely small in size.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a microminiature sculpture inside a tiny glass case.
meanings.sent2: The watchmaker created a microminiature clock that could fit on a fingertip.
meanings.sent3: The artist painted a microminiature portrait on a grain of rice!
meanings.sent4: The scientist developed a microminiature camera for spy missions.
meanings.sent5: The jeweler crafted a microminiature necklace with intricate details.
